name: @osl/osl-management-console-image
description: Red Hat OpenShift Serverless Logic Management Console Image

scripts.build:dev: pnpm cleanup && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm image:cekit:dist
scripts.image:cekit:build:linux:darwin: run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm build:dev" "pnpm setup:env make -C ./dist build"
scripts.image:cekit:build:win32: echo "Build skipped on macOS and Windows"
scripts.image:cekit:copy: rsync -av --include='modules/kogito-system-user' --include='modules/kogito-project-versions' --exclude='modules/kogito-*' --exclude='modules/sonataflow*' --include='*'  node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-image-common/resources/ dist/ && cp -R node_modules/@osl/osl-images-modules/resources/scripts ./dist/ && cp -R resources/* ./dist/ && pnpm image:cekit:copy-modules
scripts.setup:env: . ./node_modules/@osl/redhat-python-venv/venv/bin/activate && cross-env KOGITO_IMAGE_REGISTRY=$(build-env oslManagementConsoleImage.registry) KOGITO_IMAGE_REGISTRY_ACCOUNT=$(build-env oslManagementConsoleImage.account) KOGITO_IMAGE_NAME=$(build-env oslManagementConsoleImage.name) KOGITO_IMAGE_TAG=$(build-env oslManagementConsoleImage.buildTag) QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env versions.quarkus) KOGITO_VERSION=$(build-env versions.kogito) SONATAFLOW_MANAGEMENT_CONSOLE_PORT=$(build-env oslManagementConsoleImage.port)
